channel.title: CVE Feed for PI Websolution -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PI Websolution -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-29093|2024-10-10T17:11:42.074Z -- pi%20websolution -- conditional%20cart%20fee
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PI Websolution Conditional cart fee plugin <= 1.0.96 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-28988|2024-10-10T17:12:19.117Z -- pi%20websolution -- direct%20checkout%2C%20add%20to%20cart%20redirect%2C%20quick%20purchase%20button%2C%20buy%20now%20button%2C%20quick%20view%20button%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PI Websolution Direct checkout, Add to cart redirect, Quick purchase button, Buy now button, Quick View button for WooCommerce plugin <= 2.1.48 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-29423|2024-10-10T17:11:20.528Z -- pi%20websolution -- cancel%20order%20request%20%2F%20return%20order%20%2F%20repeat%20order%20%2F%20reorder%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PI Websolution Cancel order request / Return order / Repeat Order / Reorder for WooCommerce plugin <= 1.3.2 versions.
